title: Security Policy
text: believe found security vulnerability repositories organization, please report us coordinated disclosure. Please report security vulnerabilities public GitHub issues, discussions, pull requests. title: The `adam_db` argument
text: remove ADSL variables database non-ADSL datasets merge ADSL variables back needed. Note keys defined data analysis plan Roche.
code: library(chevron) #> Registered S3 method overwritten by 'tern': #>   method   from  #>   tidy.glm broom library(dm) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dm' #> The following object is masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter  syn_data <- syn_test_data()[c("adsl", "adae", "adlb", "adrs", "adsub")]  drop_adsl_vars <- function(df, adsl) {   df[c("USUBJID", "STUDYID", setdiff(names(df), names(adsl)))] }  dbl <- c(list(adsl = syn_data$adsl), lapply(syn_data[-1], drop_adsl_vars, adsl = syn_data$adsl))  ### Define primary and foreign keys adam_study_data <- new_dm(dbl) %>%   dm_add_pk(adsl, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID")) %>%   dm_add_fk(adae, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID"), ref_table = "adsl") %>%   dm_add_pk(adae, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID", "ASTDTM", "AETERM", "AESEQ")) %>%   dm_add_fk(adlb, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID"), ref_table = "adsl") %>%   dm_add_pk(adlb, c(     "STUDYID", "USUBJID", "PARAMCD", "BASETYPE", "AVISITN",     "ATPTN", "DTYPE", "ADTM", "LBSEQ", "ASPID"   )) %>%   dm_add_fk(adrs, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID"), ref_table = "adsl") %>%   dm_add_pk(adrs, c("STUDYID", "USUBJID", "PARAMCD", "AVISITN", "ADTM", "RSSEQ")) %>%   dm_add_fk(adsub, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID"), ref_table = "adsl") %>%   dm_add_pk(adsub, c("USUBJID", "STUDYID", "PARAMCD"))  validate_dm(adam_study_data) #> Warning: `validate_dm()` was deprecated in dm 0.3.0. #> ‚Ñπ Please use `dm_validate()` instead.

title: Layouts in Chevron
text: chevron R package collection functions create standard tables, listings, graphs (TLGs). functions referred chevron TLG-functions. subset TLG-functions create tables. Tables created using rtables package. rtables context table layouts, .e.¬†pre-data table cell-derivation instructions. example: layout contain cell-value derivation information can used reused different data Hence layouts define table pre-data. , layout functions chevron never take data argument. Note pruning sorting currently performed layout space rtables rather actual table objects. Also, layouts allow certain queries variables required build table using given layout: chevron creating tables always explicit layout creation *_lyt functions. example aet02_1 layout function: Note aet02_1_lyt function returns concise description tern rtables can used create cell values tables. table creation function use *_lyt function builds table using build_table data given adam_db shown next:
code: library(rtables) #> Loading required package: magrittr #> Loading required package: formatters  lyt <- basic_table() %>%   split_cols_by("ARM") %>%   analyze("AGE", mean)  lyt #> A Pre-data Table Layout #>  #> Column-Split Structure: #> ARM (lvls)  #>  #> Row-Split Structure: #> AGE (** analysis **) adsl <- data.frame(   ARM = factor(sample(c("ARM A", "ARM B"), 100, TRUE)),   AGE = runif(100, 20, 90),   COUNTRY = factor(sample(c("CHN", "USA", "BRA", "RUS"), 100, TRUE)) )  build_table(lyt, adsl) #>             ARM A              ARM B       #> title: DST01 Table 1 (Default) Patient Disposition Table 1. ‚Äî dst01_1_main
text: object class chevron_t length 1.

title: DST01 Table 1 (Default) Patient Disposition Table 1. ‚Äî dst01_1_main
text: adam_db (dm) object containing ADaM datasets armvar (character) variable. Usually one ARM, ACTARM, TRT01A, TRT01A. status_var (string) variable used define patient status. Default EOSSTT, however can also variable name pattern EOPxxSTT xx must substituted 2 digits referring analysis period. disc_reason_var (string) variable used define reason patient withdrawal. Default DCSREAS, however can also variable pattern DCPxxRS xx must substituted 2 digits referring analysis period. lbl_overall (character) label used overall column, set NULL overall column omitted deco (character) decoration title, subtitles main_footer content ... used. completed_lbl (string) associated completed study found columns given status. Default COMPLETED. ongoing_lbl (string) associated ongoing treatment found columns given status_treatment. Default `ONGOING. discontinued_lbl (string) associated discontinued study found columns given status. Default DISCONTINUED. tlg (TableTree, Listing ggplot) object typically produced main function. prune_0 (logical) remove 0 count rows

title: DST01 Table 1 (Default) Patient Disposition Table 1. ‚Äî dst01_1_main
text: Default patient disposition table summarizing reasons patients withdrawal. Numbers represent absolute numbers patients fraction N. Remove zero-count rows. Split columns arm. Include total column default. Sort withdrawal reasons alphabetic order. Since two parts tables pruned differently, layout function returns list layouts, allows tables constructed pruned separately binding.

title: DST01 Table 3 (Supplementary) Patient Disposition Table 3. ‚Äî dst01_3_main
text: object class chevron_t length 1.

title: DST01 Table 3 (Supplementary) Patient Disposition Table 3. ‚Äî dst01_3_main
text: adam_db (dm) object containing ADaM datasets armvar (character) variable used column splitting status_var (character) variable used define patient status. Default EOSSTT, however can also variable name pattern EOPxxSTT xx must substituted 2 digits referring analysis period. disc_reason_var (character) variable used define reason patient withdrawal. Default DCSREAS, however can also variable pattern DCPxxRS xx must substituted 2 digits referring analysis period. status_treatment_var (string) variable used define treatment status patients. Default EOTSTT, however can also variable pattern EOTxxSTT xx must substituted 2 digits referring analysis period. lbl_overall (character) label used overall column, set NULL overall column omitted deco (character) decoration title, subtitles main_footer content ... used. completed_trt_lbl (string) associated completed treatment found columns given status_treatment_var. Default COMPLETED. discontinued_trt_lbl (string) associated discontinued treatment found columns given status_treatment_var. Default DISCONTINUED. ongoing_trt_lbl (string) associated ongoing treatment found columns given status_treatment_var. Default `ONGOING. tlg (TableTree, Listing ggplot) object typically produced main function. prune_0 (logical) remove 0 count rows

title: DST01 Table 3 (Supplementary) Patient Disposition Table 3. ‚Äî dst01_3_main
text: Non-standard disposition table summarizing reasons patient withdrawal treatment status. Withdrawal reasons grouped Safety Non-Safety issues. Safety issues include Death Adverse Events. Numbers represent absolute numbers patients fraction N. Remove zero-count rows. Split columns arm. Include total column default. Sort withdrawal reasons alphabetic order.
